title: Constructivist Language Learning Design for Higher-Order Thinking Skills Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and foundational workplace task experience
context.additional_context: A language education program for working professionals to strengthen workplace efficiency and communication skills

learning_goals: Learners can apply critical thinking and creative problem-solving strategies by analyzing real workplace scenarios
Learners revise their language expressions through peer feedback and complete presentations with logical persuasiveness
Learners design collaborative projects using digital tools (smartphone apps) and receive evaluations of their execution results

resources: Smartphone-Compatible Collaboration Tools (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
